availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Native of Ireland. Married to James Donnelly. Mother of James Donnelly, Catharine Donnelly, Patrick Donnelly, Mary Ann Donnelly, and John Donnelly. Resident of Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Resident of Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, District 4, p. 274A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 7, p. 542.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 9, p. 223B.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport (before 1911), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 7007127, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 303.
